definition: to worry/to concern oneself with/worried/anxiety/sorrow/(literary) to observe mourning
to thrive in calamity and perish in soft living (idiom)/life springs from sorrow and calamity, death comes from ease and pleasure
pinyin: sheng1 yu2 you1 huan4 , si3 yu2 an1 le4

sentences.english: What the gentleman worries about is the Way and not poverty.
sentences.chinese: 君子忧患的是没有学问而不忧患贫困。

sentences.english: What the gentleman worries about is the Way and not poverty.
sentences.chinese: 君子忧患的是没有学问而不忧患贫困。

sentences.english: And summarize the individual character of Zhou Zuoren' s suffering consciousness.
sentences.chinese: 并总结周作人忧患意识的个体特征。

sentences.english: Hapiness needs care, hardship needs patience.
sentences.chinese: 安乐需小心，忧患需耐心。

sentences.english: All my cares were over, my happiness overflowed.
sentences.chinese: 一切忧患已结束，我的幸福言之不尽。

sentences.english: An anxious nation and its visitors want very much to believe him.
sentences.chinese: 一个忧患的民族和它的来访者们极尽乐观地去相信他。

sentences.english: The consciousness of hardship was connected with the conception of loyalty.
sentences.chinese: 忧患意识和忠君观念是紧密联系在一起的。

sentences.english: The consciousness of hardship was the self-knowledge to the scholar-bureaucrats in feudal society.
sentences.chinese: 忧患意识则是古代封建社会士大夫的一种人生自觉。

sentences.english: In their trials and difficulties the members of the gens assisted each other.
sentences.chinese: 氏族成员在他们处于忧患困难之时彼此相互援助。

sentences.english: A virtuous person chest without care, let destiny without hardship.
sentences.chinese: 有德者胸无牵挂，听凭天命而没有忧患。

sentences.english: Many she sees where cares have carved some.
sentences.chinese: 她见到许多面孔，都有忧患的留痕。

sentences.english: The miserable consciousness is a consciousness which is prepared ford anger in times of peace.
sentences.chinese: 忧患意识是一种居安思危意识，它产生于夏商时期。
对美国人现在的忧患意识我颇为高兴。

sentences.english: I'm confident that the worry will inspire Americans to adapt and improve.
sentences.chinese: 我有信心，忧患意识会激发美国人，去变革，去提高。

sentences.english: They must be the most proactive indigenous people on earth.
sentences.chinese: 它们一定是地球上最具忧患意识的土著人。

sentences.english: Berlin's200-year history as a capital city has been fraught with war andrebuilding.
sentences.chinese: 柏林作为首都的两百年历史充满战争和重建的忧患。

definition: to thrive in calamity and perish in soft living (idiom)/life springs from sorrow and calamity, death comes from ease and pleasure
pinyin: sheng1 yu2 you1 huan4 , si3 yu2 an1 le4

definition: see 生於憂患，死於安樂|生于忧患，死于安乐[sheng1 yu2 you1 huan4 , si3 yu2 an1 le4]
see 苟且偷安[gou3 qie3 tou1 an1]
(of a nation) to be destroyed/subjugation/vanquished nation
to flourish and decay/rise and fall
long-term considerations/to take the long view
